
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define FL(a) memset(a, 0, sizeof a);
#define pi(a) cout <<  a << endl;
#define si(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define pis(n) printf("%d ",n);
#define FREP(b) for(int i=0;i<b;i++)
#define REP(a,b,c) for(int a=b;a<c;a++)
typedef pair<int,int> ii;
typedef long long LL;
/*

LL A[1000008];
int hf[1000008];
int main()
{
    LL ans;
    int test;
    int n,q,a,b;
    cin >> test;
    while(test--){
        si(n);si(q);
        FREP(n) cin >> A[i];
        FL(hf);
        sort(A, A+n);
        while(q--){
            cin >> a >> b;
            a--,b--;
            REP(j,a,b+1){
                hf[j]++;
            }
        }
        ans = 0;
        sort(hf,hf+n);
        FREP(n) ans += hf[i]*A[i];
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
